title: Elegant Double-Strand Black Beads Chain - Karimani Mala
features: This delicate two-strand chain features meticulously hand-strung black beads, each separated by tiny gold accents. The uniform faceting of the black beads creates a subtle sparkle. The gold wire weaving demonstrates superior craftsmanship. The minimalist design allows it to be paired with various outfits.
occasions: as a simple and elegant addition to any outfit. Can be layered with other traditional necklaces.
description: This minimalist karimani mala is handcrafted with care, using high-purity gold and quality black beads. Its delicate design makes it a versatile and elegant addition to any jewelry collection. Represents protection and well-being. The hand-woven design ensures durability and longevity.
